channel.title: Host Gator Coupon Code
channel.description:
I just noticed this but when you got to a page that doesn't exists and it is hosted by host gator it will give you a coupon code that will take 9.94 off your first month so you only have to pay for the domain, or you can transfer one. So I tried it and it would have only cost me 15.01 for the first month. Just wanted to let you know, I picked aplus.net and its only $4.95 for domain and first month and then 4.95 monthly, I was happy with this.
Oh yeah, i forgot to put the coupon code, it is 404PAGE.
